Recomendado 9/10
Recommended

[h1]Combine CS 1.6 and COD and what do you get? Condition Zero. [/h1]

[b]Tour of Duty Mode[/b]
     In Condition Zero, Valve have improved the CS formula by adding a story and squad mechanics. In the Tour od Duty mode, you're presented with a paragraph or so explaning your mission before you play a few rounds of CS 1.6 on all your favorite maps. Though the Tour of Duty mode can get tiresome, it's kept somewhat fresh by managing your squad. Before each mission, you can choose which squad members to bring, and you can see your team grow from a rag-tag team to a crack squad.

[b]Deleted Scenes[/b]
     The real meat and potatoes of Condition Zero lies in the Deleted Scenes extra content. I can only assume that Deleted Scenes was an early version of Condition Zero, hence the name and rough edges. Deleted Scenes plays much more like a COD game than CS. Your character is a lone badass hero, who guns his way though rooms of enemies, until he finally completes his objective. Each mission has it's own maps. You won't be playing on de_dust2 here. Instead, you'll be infiltrating a secret warehouse where some terrorits have taken a stolen nuke, or stopping an ICBM from launching. Deleted Scenes is definetly a diffrent exprence from the typical CS game, but it's also a great one.

Kinda the weird cousin to Counter Strike: Source.
But still great.

If you don't have any friends and don't know how to set up bots in Source, this is the Counter Strike game for you.
Of course, I know how to set up bots in Source, but I play this game simply for the fact that the Singleplayer is just kinda "play one map, unlock the next". And that's quite cool considering it's a singleplayer element to a natively-multiplayer series.

Plus it comes with Counter Strike 1.6 (I think it came with that, I see it in my library and remember getting it with Condition Zero) and some deleted scenes. So yeah. Try those both out too.

All time Fav Game!!!

《Valve大包评测之反恐精英：零点行动》（下文简称CZ）
      这次的CZ做了剧情和经典任务两个模式，我想将它们分开来说

先来说说[h1]经典任务模式[/h1]（Counter-Strike: Condition Zero）
  个人认为这个模式做的并不是很好，不仅有在玩RPG的感觉，而且里面的AI还挺智障的，做任务的感觉还很无聊，还不如去玩CS1.5，所以这个模式我并不推荐大家去多玩。


精彩的[h1] 单人剧情模式[/h1]（Counter-Strike: Condition Zero Deleted Scencs）
 这才是这个游戏的本体！我们的主角要顶着主角光环前往世界各地铲除恐怖势力，游戏中的场景刻画出的气氛，比如战火的城市、幽静的雨林、雪地等等，即便是在现代也是非常优秀的，还有一路杀出重围的爽快感觉，还可以使用CS原作中不曾出现的战术装备。Mother F**K yeah，总而言之单人剧情很赞！

总体打分：82/100
GREAT IDEA, GREAT PEOPLE , GREAT RESULTS

Realmente um ótimo jogo, vale muito a pena, pra quem gosta de jogos como cod4 e mw2 vai amar, o jogo é simplesmente igualzin, um modern warfare counter strike, <3 amo esse jogo Baixe o Deleted Scenes para a campanha  (Boa demais) e o normal para mp (ótimo), nele você joga na SAS, Spetz natz Seal team 6, Aquela unidade dos japas e gsg9, resgatando refems e completando missões na argentina , no usa , na russia   e no UK, O ultima missão é muito boa, para resolver os bugs de loading só me add na steam que eu explico certinho!
